about_the_game:
Get ready to hit the rugged Alaskan wilderness in the Model Builder! With the Alaskan Road Truckers DLC we are expending already existing collection of models and giving you the possibility to recreate your favorite trucks! Customize them with unique modifications, colors or decals! Gear up, hit the road, and experience the thrill of Alaskan trucking like never before!

This DLC contains:
  • Westend Sorrow 420
    The Westend Sorrow 420, equipped with a robust 416 horsepower engine and a smooth 14-speed transmission, is the workhorse truck essential to keeping the goods in Alaska flowing seamlessly. Its impressive horsepower not only ensures a swift journey through challenging terrains but also allows it to handle the most demanding jobs.

  • Eagle One
    The Eagle One is a juggernaut of the road, packed with a powerful 494 horsepower engine and a 14-speed transmission. That extra horsepower allows the Eagle One to handle the toughest of terrains while hauling heavy loads. With the mountainous terrain of Alaska and type of jobs available this truck comes in handy.

Get building, get creative!

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.

supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Italian, French, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
